channel.title: Katana
channel.description: well idk how i can improve on my katana anymore so here it is: Handle Close up [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Katanahandle.jpg[/img] Side View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Katana12-0.jpg[/img] Other View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Katana2-0.jpg[/img] Constructive Criticism is welcomed :D

item.title: Katana
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:10, topic:275774”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=364292.msg2767284#msg2767284 date=1240886651]

looks pretty good, what did you make this on?

i model in blender. i know most of you will laugh at me for using it.

Doesn’t matter what you model in…

Blender is HIGHLY capable.
[/quote][quote author=jme link=topic=364292.msg2767305#msg2767305 date=1240888340]

looks pretty good, what did you make this on?

i model in blender. i know most of you will laugh at me for using it.

Blender is one of the most powerful free tools, and it’s open source. It’s a good choice.

I probably spent more time with wings3d then anything else. But I was making low poly game models. I learned maya at school though…
[/quote]
I agree. i love blender, but alot of people frown upon it cause of its (supposedly) complex interface, and the fact that its free software makes some people not even bother.at my school we’re using blender for 3D. we also have C4d(surprisingly) and Wings3D[/quote]
hell I could care less what you use, it looks good

Read full topic

i model in blender. i know most of you will laugh at me for using it.
[/quote]

Blender is one of the most powerful free tools, and it’s open source. It’s a good choice.

I probably spent more time with wings3d then anything else. But I was making low poly game models. I learned maya at school though…[/quote]
I agree. i love blender, but alot of people frown upon it cause of its (supposedly) complex interface, and the fact that its free software makes some people not even bother.at my school we’re using blender for 3D. we also have C4d(surprisingly) and Wings3D

item.title: Katana
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

IIRC, katana’s don’t have a ‘fold’ in the middle like swords. And they are slashing weapons, not stabbing weapons, so they don’t have a point that sharp.
